QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_WindowBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of windows.

QtoDef.Name: Width
QtoDef.Definition: Total outer width of the window lining. It should only be provided, if it is a rectangular window.

QtoDef.Name: Height
QtoDef.Definition: Total outer heigth of the window lining. It should only be provided, if it is a rectangular window.

QtoDef.Name: Perimeter
QtoDef.Definition: Total perimeter of the outer lining of the window.

QtoDef.Name: Area
QtoDef.Definition: Total area of the outer lining of the window.
